query: Show me papers published by Dominik Hartl in Frontiers in Cellular and Infection Microbiology in 2018 especially related to the following sentence: Staphylococcus aureus is one of the major human pathogenic bacteria that can cause a broad spectrum of moderate to severe infections ranging from skin and orthopedic infections to fatal necrotizing pneumonia and sepsis.

keywords.Semantic Query: Staphylococcus aureus is one of the major human pathogenic bacteria that can cause a broad spectrum of moderate to severe infections ranging from skin and orthopedic infections to fatal necrotizing pneumonia and sepsis.
